transcript.content: Redesign the database schema for better performance

I've analyzed the current schema. Here are three options for optimization:

Option A: Denormalize user data (faster reads, more storage)
Option B: Add materialized views (complex maintenance, good performance)  
Option C: Implement read replicas (infrastructure cost, excellent scaling)

Which option would you like to go with?
